Title: Je l'aimais
Writer: Zabou Breitman (screenplay), Anna Gavalda (novel), Agnès de Sacy (screenplay)
Actors: Daniel Auteuil, Marie-Josée Croze, Florence Loiret Caille, Christiane Millet
Plot: Someone I loved (Je L'Aimais) is based on the best-selling novel by Anna Gavalda. It's the story of Pierre (Daniel Auteuil), who takes his daughter-in-law, Chloe (Florence Loiret Caille) ...
